nodes.text: Distilon was a world that was the site of a battle between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire between 2 BBY and 3 ABY. Rebel pilots Wedge Antilles and Derek Klivian, who had previously defected from the Empire, participated in the fighting at Distilon.
Distilon was mentioned in "Rendezvous Point," a short story written by Jason Fry and published in From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back in 2020.
